sentences.en: By then, you will have the good karmic conditions necessary to deliver other sentient beings.
sentences.cn: 所以广结善缘,将来才会有福报,才能人见人欢喜,也才有度化众生的善因缘.

sentences.en: Care for sentient beings and let go of your achievement.
sentences.cn: 要把众生的幸福提起,要把自我的成就放下.

sentences.en: Disciple wishes to dedicate all merits to all sentient beings.
sentences.cn: 弟子愿回向所有功德给所有众生.

sentences.en: Emulate the compassion of Avalokitesvara Bodhisattva, show concern for sentient beings.
sentences.cn: 效法观音菩萨的慈悲, 憨念大众.

sentences.en: Furthermore, it teaches us to love all sentient beings equally.
sentences.cn: 接着它教导我们应该平等爱护一切众生.

sentences.en: His gut rebelled against the taste of sentient flesh.
sentences.cn: 他闻到血腥的时候开始反胃.

sentences.en: If there are sentient beings out there, the signals will reach them.
sentences.cn: 如果有那里有着它们的有情众生, 信号将会传送给它们.

sentences.en: May all share this thankful feeling and express it in one's attitude toward other sentient beings!
sentences.cn: 愿大家分享此感恩之情并将之表达于对其他有情的态度上!

sentences.en: Please turn in a clockwise direction while thinking of benefiting all sentient beings.
sentences.cn: 请采顺时针方向转动,并同时观想,转经轮利益着一切有情.

sentences.en: RECOGNISING that animals are living, sentient beings and therefore deserve special consideration and respect.
sentences.cn: 基于动物是活生生, 有知觉的生物,因而值得特殊考量与尊重.

sentences.en: Serenity of spirit and love for all sentient creation are enjoined by the Buddha.
sentences.cn: 宁静而平和的心境及对一切有情众生的悲愍和博爱是佛陀所倡导的.

sentences.en: The living knew themselves just sentient puppets on God's stage.
sentences.cn: 生还者认识到,他们不过是上帝的舞台上有知觉的木偶而已.

sentences.en: The other two pieces are " Living Toys " and " Pre - Sentient "
sentences.cn: 另外两个节目是 “ 活泼的玩具 ” 和 “ 预感 ”

sentences.en: Usually, fish a dream represent sentient beings.
sentences.cn: 一般梦见鱼,是表示众生.
